title: Over the Edge
description: Rangers in Rocky Mountain National Park question if the death of a woman who fell from a cliff while hiking with her husband was an accident or a heinous act of violence. Andrea Canning has chosen this episode as one of her most memorable classic episodes.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
